chest.name: Strength of Soul
chest.desc: Lesser Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, and Flash Heal reduce the remaining duration of Weakened Soul on targets they heal by 4 sec.

chest.name: Serendipity
chest.desc: Healing with Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Lesser Heal, Heal, greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing by 20% for 20 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

chest.name: Void Plague
chest.desc: Afflicts the target with a disease that causes 116 Shadow damage over 18 sec.

chest.name: Twisted Faith
chest.desc: Mind Flay and Mind Blast deal 20% increased damage to targets afflicted with your Shadow Word: Pain.

glove.name: Shadow Word: Death
glove.desc: A word of dark binding that inflicts 130 to 152 Shadow damage to the target. If the target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, the caster takes damage equal to the damage inflicted upon the target.

glove.name: Circle of Healing
glove.desc: Heals all of the target playerâ€™s party members within 15 yards of target player for 82 to 92.

glove.name: Penance
glove.desc: Launches a volley of holy light at the target, causing 64 Holy damage to an enemy, or 171 healing to an ally, instantly and every 1 sec for 2 sec.

glove.name: Mind Sear
glove.desc: Causes an explosion of shadow magic around the enemy target, causing 35 to 39 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 5 sec to all enemies within 10 yards around the target.

leg.name: Prayer of Mending
leg.desc: Places a spell on the target that heals them for 15 the next time they take damage or receive healing. When the heal occurs, Prayer of mending jumps to a party or raid member within 20 yards. Jumps up to 5 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump. This spell can only be placed on one target at a time.

leg.name: Homunculi
leg.desc: Break off splinters of your soul to animate 3 miniature copies of yourself that attempt to attack your current target with a mace, sword, and axe, reducing the attack speed, attack power, and armor respectively of any target they hit.

leg.name: Shared Pain
leg.desc: Your Shadow Word: Pain now also afflicts up to 2 additional nearby targets within 15 yards.

leg.name: Power Word: Barrier
leg.desc: Summons a holy barrier to protect all party members at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 25% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
